title: Welcome to S.I.P.I. Bar
text-1: The oasis of Hip Hop music in the heart of Kapana. We are inspired by the energy and unique style of the Hip Hop scene. With us you will enjoy signature cocktails, party atmosphere and musical experiences. S.I.P.I. Bar is more than a place for drinks; it's an experience where party art people come together every weekend to share their love of music and Hip Hop culture.
text-2: Indulge in special moments at S.I.P.I. and have fun with your people in the company of the best Hip Hop music from your favorite Bulgarian DJs. We will welcome you with shots and signature cocktails in a friendly atmosphere and a #party setting where you will have fun until dawn. The themed parties at S.I.P.I. turn it into a parallel reality in which you are the most important.
